pkgmetadata.longdescription: Github v3 API Python SDKThis software is a 100% pure Python interface to Github v3 API which provides OAuth2.0 authentication and API calling wrapper.You can find docs and source code at:http://michaelliao.github.io/githubpy/Developed and mantained by Michael Liao. Please feel free to report bugs and your suggestions at:https://github.com/michaelliao/githubpy/
